content.heading: Tables Overview
paragraphs: HTML tables organize data into rows and columns.

content.heading: Basic Table
paragraphs: A table uses <table>, <tr> for rows, <th> for headers, and <td> for data cells:

content.heading: Table Cells
paragraphs: Cells (<td>) hold content like text, images, or lists:

content.heading: Table Rows
paragraphs: Rows (<tr>) contain cells, with consistent cell counts per row:

content.heading: Table Headers
paragraphs: Headers (<th>) are bold and centered by default:
